list.name: ðŸ“ Deployments Annotations
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
   CompletedTime  as time,
   ProjectName as text,
   CONCAT(EnvironmentName, ',' , ReleaseVersion, ',' , DeployedBy) as tags
 FROM
   DeploymentHistory
 WHERE
  TaskState = 'Success'  AND ProjectName IN ($project) AND EnvironmentName IN ($environment) AND
  CompletedTime >=  CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND   
  CompletedTime <   CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 )
ORDER BY CompletedTime  ASC

description: Octopus Deploy reporting on projects and tasks

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(d.TaskId) as Deployment,
  CASE
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Failed' THEN 'Failed'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Success' THEN 'Success'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Canceled' THEN 'Cancelled'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Queued' THEN 'Queued'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Executing' THEN 'Executing'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'TimedOut' THEN 'Timed Out'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Cancelling' THEN 'Cancelling'
  END as metric,
  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentHistory] d
WHERE 
  d.CompletedTime >= CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND
  d.CompletedTime <   CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ) AND
  d.EnvironmentName IN ($environment) AND
  d.ProjectName IN ($project)
GROUP BY  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0),  d.TaskState
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0), COUNT(1) DESC

SELECT 
  COUNT(d.ReleaseId) AS Deployment,
    CASE
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Failed' THEN (d.ProjectName + ' - Failed')
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Success' THEN (d.ProjectName + ' - Success')
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Canceled' THEN (d.ProjectName + ' - Cancelled')
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Queued' THEN (d.ProjectName + ' - Queued')
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Executing' THEN (d.ProjectName + ' - Executing')
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'TimedOut' THEN (d.ProjectName + ' - Timed Out')
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Cancelling' THEN (d.ProjectName + ' - Cancelling')
  END as metric,
  -- $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentHistory] d
WHERE 
  d.CompletedTime >=  CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND
  d.CompletedTime <   CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ) AND
  d.EnvironmentName IN ($environment) AND
  d.ProjectName IN ($project)
GROUP BY  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0), d.TaskState, d.ProjectName
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0)

SELECT 
  AVG(DATEDIFF(ss, d.QueueTime, d.CompletedTime)) AS Duration,
  -- $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentHistory] d
WHERE
  d.CompletedTime >=  CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND   
  d.CompletedTime <   CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ) AND
  d.EnvironmentName IN ($environment) AND
  d.ProjectName IN ($project)
GROUP BY  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0)
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0)

SELECT 
  COUNT(d.ReleaseId) AS Deployment,
    CASE
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Failed' THEN 'Failed'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Success' THEN 'Success'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Canceled' THEN 'Cancelled'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Queued' THEN 'Queued'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Executing' THEN 'Executing'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'TimedOut' THEN 'Timed Out'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Cancelling' THEN 'Cancelling'
  END as metric,
  -- $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentHistory] d
WHERE 
  d.CompletedTime >=  CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND
  d.CompletedTime <   CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ) AND
  d.EnvironmentName IN ($environment) AND
  d.ProjectName IN ($project)
GROUP BY  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0), d.TaskState
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0)

SELECT 
  AVG(DATEDIFF(ss, d.QueueTime, d.CompletedTime)) AS Duration,
  -- $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '1h', 0 ) AS [time]
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentHistory] d
WHERE
  d.CompletedTime >=  CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND   
  d.CompletedTime <   CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ) AND
  d.EnvironmentName IN ($environment) AND
  d.ProjectName IN ($project)
GROUP BY  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '1h', 0)
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '1h', 0)

SELECT 
  COUNT(d.ReleaseId) AS Deployment,
    CASE
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Failed' THEN 'Failed'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Success' THEN 'Success'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Canceled' THEN 'Cancelled'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Queued' THEN 'Queued'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Executing' THEN 'Executing'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'TimedOut' THEN 'Timed Out'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Cancelling' THEN 'Cancelling'
  END as metric,
  -- $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '1h', 0 ) AS [time]
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentHistory] d
WHERE 
  d.CompletedTime >=  CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND
  d.CompletedTime <   CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ) AND
  d.EnvironmentName IN ($environment) AND
  d.ProjectName IN ($project)
GROUP BY  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '1h', 0), d.TaskState
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '1h', 0)

panels.title: Deployment Status and Duration (Week so far)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  AVG(DATEDIFF(ss, s.QueueTime, s.CompletedTime)) AS Duration,
  -- $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
  $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '15m', 0 ) AS [time]
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[Deployment] d
  INNER JOIN [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentEnvironment] e ON e.Id = d.EnvironmentId
  INNER JOIN [Octopus].[dbo].[Project] p ON p.Id = d.ProjectId
  INNER JOIN [Octopus].[dbo].[ServerTask] s ON s.Id = d.TaskId
WHERE
  s.CompletedTime >=  CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND   
  s.CompletedTime <   CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ) AND
  e.Name IN ($environment) AND
  p.Name IN ($project)
GROUP BY  $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '15m', 0)
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '15m', 0)

SELECT 
  COUNT(d.ReleaseId) AS Deployment,
    CASE
    WHEN s.State = 'Failed' THEN 'Failed'
    WHEN s.State = 'Success' THEN 'Success'
    WHEN s.State = 'Canceled' THEN 'Cancelled'
    WHEN s.State = 'Queued' THEN 'Queued'
    WHEN s.State = 'Executing' THEN 'Executing'
    WHEN s.State = 'TimedOut' THEN 'Timed Out'
    WHEN s.State = 'Cancelling' THEN 'Cancelling'
  END as metric,
  -- $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
  $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '15m'', 0 ) AS [time]
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[Deployment] d
  INNER JOIN [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentEnvironment] e ON e.Id = d.EnvironmentId
  INNER JOIN [Octopus].[dbo].[Project] p ON p.Id = d.ProjectId
  INNER JOIN [Octopus].[dbo].[Release] r ON r.Id = d.ReleaseId
  INNER JOIN [Octopus].[dbo].[ServerTask] s ON s.Id = d.TaskId
WHERE 
  s.CompletedTime >=  CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND
  s.CompletedTime <   CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ) AND
  e.Name IN ($environment) AND
  p.Name IN ($project)
GROUP BY  $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '15m', 0), s.State
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '15m', 0)

panels.title: Deployment Status and Duration (Today so far)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(d.TaskId) as Deployment,
  CASE
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Failed' THEN 'Failed'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Success' THEN 'Success'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Canceled' THEN 'Cancelled'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Queued' THEN 'Queued'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Executing' THEN 'Executing'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'TimedOut' THEN 'Timed Out'
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Cancelling' THEN 'Cancelling'
  END as metric,
  $__timeGroup(d.QueueTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentHistory] d
WHERE 
  d.QueueTime >= CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND
  d.EnvironmentName IN ($environment) AND
  d.ProjectName IN ($project)
GROUP BY  $__timeGroup(d.QueueTime, '$interval', 0),  d.TaskState
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(d.QueueTime, '$interval', 0)

SELECT
  d.EnvironmentName as Environment,
  COUNT(d.TaskId) AS Duration,
  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentHistory] d
WHERE
  d.CompletedTime >=  CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND   
  d.CompletedTime <   CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ) AND
  d.EnvironmentName IN ($environment) AND
  d.ProjectName IN ($project)
GROUP BY  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0), d.EnvironmentName
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0)

defaults.title: â±ï¸ Avg. Duration of Successful Deployments

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  AVG(DATEDIFF(ss, d.QueueTime, d.CompletedTime)) AS Duration,
  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentHistory] d
WHERE
  d.CompletedTime >=  CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND   
  d.CompletedTime <   CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ) AND
  d.EnvironmentName IN ($environment) AND
  d.ProjectName IN ($project) AND
  d.TaskState = 'Success'
GROUP BY  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0)
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0)

SELECT TOP 10
  d.ProjectName AS ProjectName,
  COUNT(d.ProjectName) AS Total
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentHistory] d
WHERE
  d.CompletedTime >=  CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND
  d.CompletedTime <   CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ) AND
  d.EnvironmentName IN ($environment) AND
  d.ProjectName IN ($project)
GROUP BY d.ProjectName
ORDER BY count(1) DESC

SELECT 
  COUNT(d.ReleaseId) AS Deployment,
  s.State AS metric,
  -- $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
  $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '1d', 0 ) AS [time]
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentHistory] d
  INNER JOIN [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentEnvironment] e ON e.Id = d.EnvironmentId
  INNER JOIN [Octopus].[dbo].[Project] p ON p.Id = d.ProjectId
  INNER JOIN [Octopus].[dbo].[Release] r ON r.Id = d.ReleaseId
  INNER JOIN [Octopus].[dbo].[ServerTask] s ON s.Id = d.TaskId
WHERE 
  s.CompletedTime >=  CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND
  s.CompletedTime <   CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ) AND
  e.Name IN ($environment) AND
  p.Name IN ($project)
GROUP BY  $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '1d', 0), s.State
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '1d', 0)

SELECT
  d.EnvironmentName as Environment,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(ss, d.QueueTime, d.CompletedTime)) AS Duration,
  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentHistory] d
WHERE
  d.CompletedTime >=  CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND   
  d.CompletedTime <   CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ) AND
  d.EnvironmentName IN ($environment) AND
  d.ProjectName IN ($project)
GROUP BY  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0), d.EnvironmentName
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0)

SELECT
  d.EnvironmentName as Environment,
  DATEDIFF(ss, d.QueueTime, d.CompletedTime) AS Duration,
  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentHistory] d
WHERE
  d.CompletedTime >=  CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND   
  d.CompletedTime <   CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ) AND
  d.EnvironmentName IN ($environment) AND
  d.ProjectName IN ($project)
GROUP BY  $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0), d.EnvironmentName, DATEDIFF(ss, d.QueueTime, d.CompletedTime)
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(d.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0)

SELECT top 100
    CASE
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Failed' THEN 0
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Success' THEN 1
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Canceled' THEN 2
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Queued' THEN 3
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Executing' THEN 4
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'TimedOut' THEN 5
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Cancelling' THEN 6
  END as Icon,
  d.EnvironmentName as Environment,
  d.ProjectName as ProjectName,
  d.ReleaseVersion,
  d.QueueTime AS StartTime,
  d.CompletedTime,
  DATEDIFF(ss, d.QueueTime, d.CompletedTime) AS Duration,
  CASE
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Failed' THEN 0
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Success' THEN 1
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Canceled' THEN 2
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Queued' THEN 3
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Executing' THEN 4
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'TimedOut' THEN 5
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Cancelling' THEN 6
  END as TaskStateCode,
  d.DeployedBy
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentHistory] d
WHERE
  d.QueueTime >= CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND
  CASE    WHEN CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 )  BETWEEN  DATEADD(DAY,-1,GETDATE()) AND GETDATE()
          THEN  isnull(d.CompletedTime,CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ))  
          ELSE
            d.CompletedTime
  END   <= CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 )
  AND--e.completed time will always =e.completed time so else statement will have no constraint
  d.EnvironmentName IN ($environment) AND
  d.ProjectName IN ($project)
ORDER BY d.QueueTime DESC

SELECT TOP 10
    CASE
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Failed' THEN 0
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Success' THEN 1
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Canceled' THEN 2
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Queued' THEN 3
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Executing' THEN 4
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'TimedOut' THEN 5
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Cancelling' THEN 6
  END as Icon,
  d.EnvironmentName as Environment,
  d.ProjectName as ProjectName,
  d.ReleaseVersion,
  DATEDIFF(ss, d.QueueTime, d.CompletedTime) AS Duration,
  CASE
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Failed' THEN 0
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Success' THEN 1
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Canceled' THEN 2
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Queued' THEN 3
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Executing' THEN 4
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'TimedOut' THEN 5
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Cancelling' THEN 6
  END as TaskStateCode
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentHistory] d
WHERE
  d.QueueTime >= CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND
  CASE    WHEN CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 )  BETWEEN  DATEADD(DAY,-1,GETDATE()) AND GETDATE()
          THEN  isnull(d.CompletedTime,CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ))  
  ELSE
    d.CompletedTime
  END   <= CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 )
  AND--e.completed time will always =e.completed time so else statement will have no constraint
  d.EnvironmentName IN ($environment) AND
  d.ProjectName IN ($project)
ORDER BY d.DurationSeconds DESC

SELECT TOP 10
  d.ProjectName AS ProjectName,
  d.EnvironmentName AS Environment,
  COUNT(d.ProjectName) AS Total
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentHistory] d
WHERE
  d.CompletedTime >=  CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND
  d.CompletedTime <   CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ) AND
  d.EnvironmentName IN ($environment) AND
  d.ProjectName IN ($project) AND
  d.TaskState = 'Failed'
GROUP BY d.ProjectName, d.EnvironmentName
ORDER BY count(1) DESC

SELECT 
  COUNT(d.ReleaseId) AS Deployment,
  s.State AS metric,
  -- $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '$interval', 0 ) AS [time]
  $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '1d', 0 ) AS [time]
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[Deployment] d
  INNER JOIN [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentEnvironment] e ON e.Id = d.EnvironmentId
  INNER JOIN [Octopus].[dbo].[Project] p ON p.Id = d.ProjectId
  INNER JOIN [Octopus].[dbo].[Release] r ON r.Id = d.ReleaseId
  INNER JOIN [Octopus].[dbo].[ServerTask] s ON s.Id = d.TaskId
WHERE 
  s.CompletedTime >=  CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND
  s.CompletedTime <   CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ) AND
  e.Name IN ($environment) AND
  p.Name IN ($project)
GROUP BY  $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '1d', 0), s.State
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(s.CompletedTime, '1d', 0)

SELECT TOP 10
    CASE
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Failed' THEN 0
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Success' THEN 1
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Canceled' THEN 2
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Queued' THEN 3
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Executing' THEN 4
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'TimedOut' THEN 5
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Cancelling' THEN 6
  END as Icon,
  d.DeploymentName as TaskName,
  d.ProjectName as Project,
  d.TaskState as Description,
  DATEDIFF(ss, d.QueueTime, d.CompletedTime) AS Duration,
  CASE
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Failed' THEN 0
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Success' THEN 1
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Canceled' THEN 2
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Queued' THEN 3
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Executing' THEN 4
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'TimedOut' THEN 5
    WHEN d.TaskState = 'Cancelling' THEN 6
  END as TaskStateCode
FROM 
  [Octopus].[dbo].[DeploymentHistory] d
WHERE
  d.QueueTime >= CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeFrom(), 0 ) AND
  CASE    WHEN CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 )  BETWEEN  DATEADD(DAY,-1,GETDATE()) AND GETDATE()
          THEN  isnull(d.CompletedTime,CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 ))  
          ELSE
            d.CompletedTime
  END   <= CONVERT( DATETIMEOFFSET, $__timeTo(), 0 )
  AND--e.completed time will always =e.completed time so else statement will have no constraint
  d.EnvironmentName IN ($environment) AND
  d.ProjectName IN ($project)
ORDER BY d.DurationSeconds DESC

title: Octopus Deploy DeploymentHistory
